vlive.korean: 보통 귀여울 때를 감자 시절이라고 하지 않나? Don't you call something cute a potato? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🍯💧즈 왔어용~☔️
vlive.english: Don't you call something cute a potato?

vlive.korean: 그러니까 - 혹시 토마스 에디슨이 (흐흫) 그 시절에? So. - Maybe it is Thomas Edison? At that time? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.110
vlive.english: So. - Maybe it is Thomas Edison? At that time?

vlive.korean: [따놓은 당상이겠네요] 감자 시절이라고 하지 않나? [of Gangwon-do, the potato production area] don't we say she's like a potato? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [IZ*ONE] 꿀물즈의 오늘도 감자한 라이브🥔❣️ (CHAEYEON&YURI talking about a story of the past)
vlive.english: [of Gangwon-do, the potato production area] don't we say she's like a potato?

vlive.korean: '그 시절 속에' 아니고? Isn't it "Back then"? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : 푸르게 빛나던 슈퍼주니어-K.R.Y.의 계절🌿
학창시절 좋아하는 과목이요? What was my favorite school subject? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 에이티니 마음에 탕🍬탕🍬사탕❤
vlive.english: What was my favorite school subject?

examples.korean: to look back nostalgically to your childhood 발음듣기 자기 어린 시절을 향수 어린 마음으로 돌아보다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to look back nostalgically to your childhood 발음

examples.korean: Those were the happiest days of my life. 발음듣기 그때가 내 인생에서 가장 행복한 시절이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Those were the happiest days of my life. 발음

examples.korean: My memories of childhood are hazy and episodic. 발음듣기 나의 유년 시절에 대한 기억은 흐릿하고 단편적이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My memories of childhood are hazy and episodic. 발음

examples.korean: Her unhappy childhood left an indelible mark. 발음듣기 그녀의 불행한 어린 시절은 지울 수 없는 흔적을 남겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her unhappy childhood left an indelible mark. 발음

examples.korean: The place was overlaid with memories of his childhood. 발음듣기 그 곳에는 그의 어린 시절 추억들이 어려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The place was overlaid with memories of his childhood. 발음
